children.description: Rotate the map (Alt+left Dragging) and then track and edit shapes in the rotated world.

This sample shows how to drag to copy a new marker and drag around.

children.title: Add a pan zoom bar
children.description:
This sample shows how to add a pan zoom bar on the map.

        Tips: A level number displays next to the drag handler on the bar during dragging when tracking level is enabled.
